MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.

Description: The 2nd Legion Of Vega, also called The Dragon's Raiders, is the premier regiment among the disgraced Legions of Vega, often considered punishment regiments among the DCMS's troops. A posting to the Legions of Vega is as good as a death sentence for most warriors, a status that the 2nd revels in as they achieve victories other regiments struggle to achieve.
